message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to buy my product from me. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As a starting point, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value to you, and I'm open to negotiating further.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that my product is worth more to you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1100000. This is a fair compromise, considering the value it will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1100000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market conditions.

I understand your concerns about the price, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $950000. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1050000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $1050000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market conditions. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand your persistence, and I appreciate your willingness to walk away. However, I'm not willing to compromise further on the price. I'm willing to make one final offer: $1025000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
